String.name: Rotation Strike
String.tooltip: Increases Rotation Combo skill damage by 15%. The effect lifts when using Rotation Combo for the third time.

String.name: Master: Smash
String.tooltip: Increases Jump Smash skill damage by $value.

String.name: Energy Boost
String.tooltip: Each stack increases skill damage and critical hit by 5%.

String.name: Energy Rush: Boost
String.tooltip: Each stack increases Attack Speed by 5% and chance to crit by 10%.

String.name: Glyph of Powerlink
String.tooltip: Using Eviscerate as a chained skill increases skill damage by $H_W_GOOD$value$COLOR_END.

String.name: Glyph of Powerlink
String.tooltip: Using Eviscerate as a chained skill increases skill damage by $H_W_GOOD$value$COLOR_END.

String.name: Protection
String.tooltip: You become invincible for the duration of the effect.

String.name: Illusion Energy
String.tooltip: Powerful Illusion Energy surrounds you, and the attack is also performed by the illusion when you use Radiant Arrow, Penetrating Arrow and Thunderbolt.

String.name: Illusion Arrow
String.tooltip: Decreases Movement Speed by $value2 and Attack Speed by $value.

String.name: Illusion Trace
String.tooltip: When the illusion attack hits, an Illusion Trace is left behind. This can be stacked up to 20 times.
